Reference:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Reference#ReferenceFHIR R5 ComplexType `Reference` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Reference` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Reference`, but has no comparisons.

name: ConceptMapR5ReferenceElementsForR4Reference
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `Reference` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions.
Element `Reference` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Reference`, but has no comparisons.
